com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.annotation

Annotation Type Autowired


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={CONSTRUCTOR,METHOD,FIELD})
public @interface Autowired

    Indicates that the annotated constructor, setter, or field is to be autowired by Infinitum.

    If a constructor is marked with this annotation, it will be used to initialize the bean. Only one such constructor can carry this annotation, and it does not have to be public.

    Fields and methods will be autowired immediately after all bean initialization has completed using a BeanPostProcessor.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/05/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String value
      Declares the qualifier indicating the name of the bean to autowire.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        Declares the qualifier indicating the name of the bean to autowire. If this is not defined, Infinitum will inject a candidate bean specified in the InfinitumContext. If there is more than one candidate bean, an InfinitumConfigurationException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        the name of the bean to inject
        Default:
        ""
